text: All Quiet on the Western Front () is a 2022 German epic anti-war movie. It is based on the 1929 novel of the same name by Erich Maria Remarque. It is directed by Edward Berger. It stars Felix Kammerer, Albrecht Schuch, Daniel Brühl, Sebastian Hülk, Aaron Hilmer, Edin Hasanovic and Devid Striesow. All Quiet on the Western Front was released to streaming on Netflix on October 28, 2022. It had strong positive reviews from critics. It received a leading 14 nominations at the 76th British Academy Film Awards and nine at the 95th Academy Awards, including Best Picture. == References == Category:2022 movies Category:BAFTA Award winning movies Category:2020s war movies Category:German movies Category:Netflix movies
title: All Quiet on the Western Front (2022 movie)
